task: Create a numbered or bulleted list
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor where you want to create the list.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Paragraph' group, click on the 'Numbering' button to create a numbered list or click on the 'Bullets' button to create a bulleted list.
Type the first item of the list and press 'Enter' to create the next item.
Continue typing the items of the list, pressing 'Enter' after each item.
To end the list, press 'Enter' twice or press 'Backspace' on an empty item.
